intro: You stumble upon an old lady, and it looks like she wants you to follow her.
You see an old woman, and choose to approach her.
You notice an old woman, who beckons to you.
You notice an old lady's silhouette, and decide to go and see what she is doing.
description: She appears to be very old, frail, and has a long and thin nose.
Her clothes are in a sorry state. They are so tattered they seem to be falling appart, as if made of dust.
Her back is curved, she seems to be nothing but bones, yet you catch in her eyes a glimpse of mischievousness. She is wearing tattered clothes, of a dull and dirty fabric.
You recall rumours regarding a clumsy witch, apparently wandering throughout the kingdom.
Completely mute, she seems worn by the years, frail, skeletal, her skin almost grey.
She doesn't really seem to understand what you are telling her.
situation: You enter what appears to be her hut, and discover that she is currently concocting a potion of sorts...
You discover a bubbling cauldron : the old woman seems to be making a potion...
You approach, only to discover that her potion-making isn't doing to well..
You observe as the old lady is brewing a potion, but soon realize that the liquid is nearly overflowing out of the cauldron...
The old woman is making a potion, but she seems to struggle with obtaining decent results in this endeavor...
She looks like she's trying to prepare a strange brew in an enormous cauldron...

witchEventNames.book: Use a spell from the spell book
witchEventNames.smallWait: Let the potion rest a little
